name: CoLoop
headline: AI Copilot for insights & strategy
description: CoLoop is the AI copilot for insights and strategy. We help insights and strategy consultants complete their qualitative analysis in 30% of the time it would take with traditional tools and methods.

founders.name: Jack Bowen, Founder
founders.description: Materials engineering by trade - spent a masters year playing around with lasers looking for new hosts for qubits 🤓. Now helping insights & strategy teams build decks in in 70% less time with AI.

founders.name: Adrien Wald, Founder
founders.description: Adrien loves to solve hard problems. He can be modeled as a function that takes caffeine as input and outputs (sometimes half-baked) product and engineering solutions. In a previous life, Adrien was a biochemist studying at Oxford. And in a life before that, a violinist for 13 years.

generated_description:
CoLoop is an innovative company based in London, founded in 2020, and is part of Y Combinator's Batch S21. Its mission? To be the AI copilot for insights and strategy, transforming how consultants handle qualitative analysis. By using CoLoop, these professionals can complete their analysis in 30% of the time typically required by conventional methods.

With a small yet dynamic team of seven, CoLoop’s technology empowers over 200 insights and strategy teams to streamline their research processes. Essentially, CoLoop enables researchers to upload their data—be it from various file formats or languages—and seamlessly convert it into a coherent, searchable structure. This means analysts can quickly generate primary analysis grids, clip meaningful quotes from transcripts, and create AI chats to answer questions about their research.

The results? A reported 73% of users find their work easier and more efficient, with the AI achieving over 92% accuracy across multiple languages and complex domains. This technology is particularly valuable for projects that involve unstructured data or multiple moderators.

Recently, CoLoop raised $3.5 million in funding, a testament to its promise and appeal in the market. With entities like Dalton Caldwell (a Group Partner at Y Combinator) backing them, the company is solidifying its place in the landscape of artificial intelligence, generative AI, and natural language processing.

Whether you’re looking to reduce the chaos in your data analysis process or simply want to save time and costs, CoLoop presents a compelling solution. Curious to dive deeper? You can explore their offerings at [CoLoop.ai](https://coloop.ai/).
